about_the_game:
Five Nights at Floppa 0 is a new Point and click first-person action horror where the main villains are the meme cats - Floppa, Bingus, Pop cat and other heroes who go out at night to hunt. Get ready for a real fight for survival and protect your office does not allow Slap and his friends to get to you!
This time the action of the game unfolds in the office of an insurance company where you got a job on the night shift as a security guard. From the first day in the office are beginning to happen strange things, Slipper and his friends are trying to attack you, but you still have to work 5 nights, so arm yourself with handy tools and start the game of survival.

You'll have a flashlight and a tablet at your disposal that you can use for protection. The tablet will give you access to surveillance cameras throughout the house. Keep track of Floppa's movements and don't forget to recharge your flashlight.
There are many memes in the game, as well as an additional mode.
